computers.description: 15-inch gaming laptop with stunning visuals up to NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 graphics and the latest 8th Gen Intel® Quad- and Hex-Core™ CPUs.
A 13-inch laptop in the size of an 11-inch, featuring a virtually borderless InfinityEdge display and 8th Gen Intel processors.​

New Surface Go is perfect for all your daily tasks, giving you laptop performance, tablet portability, and a stunning touchscreen with the power of Windows 10 Home in S mode. Surface Go Signature Type Cover and Surface Pen sold separately.
